devdoc.details: Use address(0) to represent native token (ETH/FLOW/HBAR on EVM).

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

params._from: The token owner for ERC20 transferFrom (ignored for native legs)

devdoc.title: Simple Escrow (Relayer-friendly)

depositFor(address,address[],address[],u.notice: Relayer-friendly path. For ERC20, user must approve this Escrow as spender:         IERC20(token).approve(address(this), amount)

userdoc.notice: Minimal escrow with:         - viewEscrow(merchant)         - deposit(...)           // user-pays gas path (unchanged)         - depositFor(from, ...)  // relayer path (Escrow is spender)         - withdraw()             // merchant pulls all their balances
